title: 5 Easy Steps to Join a Discord Server on Android

steps.title: Open the Discord app.
steps.content: Open the Discord app. This looks like Discord's mascot, Wumpus, with a blue-purple background. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now. If you were sent a server invite directly through a Direct Message , you can tap Join to automatically join the server. [1] X Research source If you want to manually enter a server invite link shared from a different platform, continue with this method.

steps.title: Tap +.
steps.content: Tap + . It’s in the left column. This opens the Servers window. If you don't see this panel, tap the Home tab at the bottom-left corner.

steps.title: Tap Join a Server.
steps.content: Tap Join a Server . This is at the bottom of the page. Keep in mind you must have the invite link on hand.

steps.title: Enter the server’s invite link.
steps.content: Enter the server’s invite link. If you don’t have an invite URL or code for a specific server, try searching for one online. You can browse other platforms like X (Twitter), Instagram , or TikTok for servers. Just search for your interest along with the tag "DiscordServer" or similar. If you see Invite Expired , you'll need to ask for another invite.

steps.title: Tap Join with Invite Link.
steps.content: Tap Join with Invite Link . It’s the blue button at the bottom of the screen. Now that you’ve joined the server, you’ll see its icon in the list of servers along the left side of Discord.
